snippet: For the second year in a row, Toyota led the nation with the most vehicles recalled: nearly 5.3 million in 2013.
abstract: Toyota, for the second year in a row, led the nation with the most vehicles recalled: nearly 5.3 million in 2013.
lead_paragraph: For the second year in a row, Toyota led the nation with the most vehicles recalled: nearly 5.3 million in 2013.

headline.main: Toyota Is Reported With Most Recalls in 2013
headline.print_headline: Toyota Is Reported With Most Recalls in 2013
